title: In your opinion, what is the coolest armour of all time? - Quora

response.answer_text: Dr Tobias Capwell's Black & Gold harness. He has since gone through two other kits. You can see it here.English Armour c.1440-60  A unique armour in the English style The next kit can be seen here.   For my own self I'm going to go with a transitional harness with a klappavisor bacinet from Clang Armory when I have the cash.
